amendment.description: To improve the provisions relating to the linking of award and incentive fees to acquisition outcomes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4371 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4371 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Coburn. (consideration: CR S6346-6366; text: CR S6356) To improve the provisions relating to the linking of award and incentive fees to acquisition outcomes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4371 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4371 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Coburn.
